ygData.subject: specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: question about specialization: 1) is it implemented yet? 2) if so, where do i get it? (i was in qeynos and my trainer guy didnt have it listed, and i am lvl
ygData.messageBody:
question about specialization:

1) is it implemented yet?

2) if so, where do i get it? (i was in qeynos and my trainer guy didnt have
it listed, and i am lvl 21)

3) i hear it cripples all your other disciplines (ie, if you take
alteration as a specialization, all your other casting discliplines cant go
any higher then 51 or something)

any help appreciated, as i dont have the time at work to scour the internet
looking for the answers, i gotta make a game!!!! hehe =)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
